column1: #Text=Main Asami Sato Bolin Bumi Korra Kya Mako Raiko Tenzin Tonraq Varrick Antagonists Dark spirits Desna and Eska Unalaq says : " Minor Buttercup Raiko Ginger Ikki Jinora Katara Lin Beifong Lu and Gang Meelo Naga Oogi Pabu Pema Shiro Shinobi Song Zhu Li " Shiro Shinobi says : " The Equalists are on the attack !
#Text=Amon has torn down the tyrannical bending government !
#Text=He has declared bending illegal , and he has the Avatar on the run .
#Text=Our great leader has a vision for the future .
#Text=One day soon , bending will no longer exist and we will live in a world where everyone is finally equal !
#Text=The United Forces are on their way right now to try and stop that dream .
#Text=" Korra says : " Can you believe Hiroshi ?!
#Text=Let 's go back up there and knock some heads ; they 'll never know what hit 'em .
#Text=General Iroh 's coming with an entire fleet of battleships .
#Text=Then Amon will be the one who 's running .
#Text=" Korra says : " I hate this " being patient " stuff .
